definition: A drastic and far-reaching change in ways of thinking and behaving.

definition: A radical supporter of political or social revolution.

definition: Change radically.

definition: Turn on or around an axis or a center.

definition: A recompense for worthy acts or retribution for wrongdoing.

definition: Something that has been written again.

definition: Massive powerful herbivorous odd-toed ungulate of southeast asia and africa having very thick skin and one or two horns on the snout.
Correspondence in the sounds of two or more lines (especially final sounds).

definition: The basic rhythmic unit in a piece of music.

definition: Recurring with measured regularity; - john galsworthy.

definition: Support resembling the rib of an animal.

definition: Any long object resembling a thin line.
example: a mere ribbon of land

definition: Grains used as food either unpolished or more often polished.
People who have possessions and wealth (considered as a group).

definition: Relieve from.

definition: A difficult problem.

definition: A journey in a vehicle (usually an automobile).
example: he took the family for a drive in his new car

definition: A traveler who actively rides an animal (as a horse or camel).
A long narrow natural elevation or striation.

definition: Inspiring scornful pity; - dashiell hammett.
example: how silly an ardent and unsuccessful wooer can be especially if he is getting on in years

definition: An abstract idea of that which is due to a person or governmental body by law or tradition or nature; ; - eleanor roosevelt.
example: they are endowed by their Creator with certain unalienable Rights

definition: Adhering to moral principles.
Located on or directed toward the right.
example: a right-hand turn

definition: With honesty.

definition: The shape of a raised edge of a more or less circular object.

definition: A characteristic sound.

definition: A dissolute man in fashionable society.

definition: Fully developed or matured and ready to be eaten or used.

definition: A growth in strength or number or importance.

definition: A source of danger; a possibility of incurring loss or misfortune.

definition: Involving risk or danger.

definition: An established ceremony prescribed by a religion.

definition: Any customary observance or practice.

definition: The contestant you hope to defeat.

definition: A large natural stream of water (larger than a creek).

definition: An open way (generally public) for travel or transportation.

definition: Edge of a way or road or path.

definition: Move about aimlessly or without any destination, often in search of food or employment.

definition: A deep prolonged loud noise.

definition: A piece of meat roasted or for roasting and of a size for slicing into more than one portion.

definition: Take something away by force or without the consent of the owner.

definition: Larceny by threat of violence.

A mechanism that can move automatically.
A lump or mass of hard consolidated mineral matter.

definition: Any vehicle self-propelled by a rocket engine.
Abounding in rocks or stones.

definition: The actions and activities assigned to or required or expected of a person or group.

definition: Rotary motion of an object around its own axis.

definition: A deep prolonged sound (as of thunder or large bells).

definition: A relationship between two lovers.

definition: A soulful or amorous idealist.

definition: A protective covering that covers or forms the top of a building.
